title: Deep Learning Fundamentals and Practice for Tax Administration Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and experience with simple Excel usage
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education utilizing simplified simulation data based on real tax-processing cases.

learning_goals: Explain at least three potential applications of deep learning technology in tax administration tasks.
Compare and explain classification models based on Neural Networks and Self-Organizing Maps (SOM).
Implement a classification model with over 75% performance using a simulated dataset of real tax data.
Identify at least two legal/ethical issues that may arise when applying AI technology.

resources: Python-based Deep Learning Library (Colab Lite Version)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
